EmailTemplate.name: EOI/CA submitted Form
EmailTemplate.subject: {EOI_CAForm} is successfully submitted for {ProjectName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {Customer},
Thank you for submitting the {EOI_CA_Number} application form for {Project}. A copy of the form has been attached with this email for your reference.
Feel free to contact the Dynamix team in case of any concerns.
Regards, Dynamix Group
